title: Arabic 47
text: By My beauty! To tinge thy hair with thy blood is greater in My sight than the creation of the universe and the light of both worlds. Strive then to attain this, O servant!
teaser: By My beauty! To tinge thy hair...

prev.title: Arabic 46
prev.text: Ponder and reflect. Is it thy wish to die upon thy bed, or to shed thy lifeblood on the dust, a martyr in My path, and so become the manifestation of My command and the revealer of My light in the highest paradise? Judge thou aright, O servant!

next.title: Arabic 48
next.text: For everything there is a sign. The sign of love is fortitude under My decree and patience under My trials.
